42#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
43# include <config.h>
44#endif /* HAVE_CONFIG_H */
45#include <am_defs.h>
46#if __NetBSD_Version__ > 200030000
47#define statfs statvfs
48#endif
49
50extern int is_same_host(char *name1, char *name2, struct in_addr addr2);
51int fixmount_check_mount(char *host, struct in_addr hostaddr, char *path);
52
53int
54fixmount_check_mount(char *host, struct in_addr hostaddr, char *path)
55{
56 struct statfs *mntbufp, *mntp;
57 int nloc, i;
58 char *colon;
59
60 /* read mount table from kernel */
61 nloc = getmntinfo(&mntbufp, MNT_NOWAIT);
62 if (nloc <= 0) {
63 perror("getmntinfo");
64 exit(1);
65 }
66
67 mntp = mntbufp;
68 for (i=0; i<nloc; ++i) {
69 if ((colon = strchr(mntp->f_mntfromname, ':'))) {
70 *colon = '\0';
71 if (STREQ(colon + 1, path) &&
72 is_same_host(mntp->f_mntfromname, host, hostaddr))
73 return 1;
74 }
75 }
76
77 return 0;
78}
79
